      • addReservation

        public Reservation addReservation(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.util.ArrayList<Room> rooms,
                                  int numOfPeople,
                                  java.time.LocalDate checkInDate,
                                  int numOfNights,
                                  java.lang.String email,
                                  boolean breakfast)
        Adds reservation to the reservations.

        The rooms passed in are only suggestions as such... the method finds similar rooms to the rooms passed in and checks if they are availible. The method also updates the reservation files with the new reservation

        Parameters:
        name -
        rooms -
        numOfPeople -
        checkInDate -
        numOfNights -
        email -
        breakfast -
        Returns:
        Reservation

      • cancelReservation

        public Reservation cancelReservation(Reservation rv)
        Cancels the reservation passed in

        Checks if the money is refundable for the reservation, given the date and time the cancellation is attempted Removes the reservation from the reservation file and adds it to the cancelled reservations file

        Parameters:
        rv -
        Returns:
        Reservation
